representation_information.name: Information technology -- Generic coding of moving pictures and associated audio information (formal name) MPEG-2 (common name), 4:2:2 Profile
representation_information.description: Profile of MPEG-2 video compression that permits the use of Intra-coded (I) frames, predicted (P) frames, and bidirectionally predicted (B) frames. Uses color sampling of 4:2:2.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
